name: ai-sdk-preview-rag (vercel-labs)
description: [项目级] Retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) template powered by the AI SDK.。来源: https://github.com/vercel-labs/ai-sdk-preview-rag

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) template powered by the AI SDK.

来源: https://github.com/vercel-labs/ai-sdk-preview-rag
语言: TypeScript
Stars: 397

genes.title: 项目结构
genes.content:
LICENSE
README.md
app
app/(preview)
app/favicon.ico
components.json
components
components/icons.tsx
components/project-overview.tsx
components/ui
drizzle.config.ts
lib
lib/actions
lib/ai
lib/db
lib/env.mjs
lib/utils.ts
next.config.mjs
package.json
pnpm-lock.yaml

genes.title: 核心特性
genes.content:
- Information retrieval and addition through tool calls using the [`streamText`](https://ai-sdk.dev/docs/reference/ai-sdk-core/stream-text) function
- Real-time streaming of model responses to the frontend using the [`useChat`](https://ai-sdk.dev/docs/reference/ai-sdk-ui/use-chat) hook
- Vector embedding storage with [DrizzleORM](https://orm.drizzle.team/) and [PostgreSQL](https://www.postgresql.org/)
- Animated UI with [Framer Motion](https://www.framer.com/motion/)
